p: IMB-DM122 ( 33) was designed and semi-synthesized using matrine as the lead compound. Compound 33 was found to be an effective and safe inhibitor of Hsc70 mRNA/protein expression in human hepatocytes. Compound 33 inhibited HCV replication through the destabilization of Hsc70 mRNA, and the half-life of host Hsc70 mRNA was reduced by 78% after treatment with 33. Compound 33 appeared to be highly efficient at inhibiting Hsc70-related HCV replication. In addition, compound 33 showed a good safety profile in vitro as well as in vivo with no indication of harmful effects on liver and kidney functions 44 ( Figure 3).
